content: Awesome and beautifully written! My current dilema with my mom. She does all the nots! And ive tried telling her all these dos! Doesnt listen of course per her infinite knowledge and great wisdom at the ripe old age of 52. Its aweful experiencing this all the time. I dont like it at all. Its scary actually experiencing all the “donts” you wrote about all at once in a long tirade that lasts hours and don’t stop. When I “grow up” I will be mature enough to not listen to the nonsense. Please write back. TH
